artist: Yamamura Kōka (Toyonari); Published by Yamamura Kōka Hanga Kankōkai
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: man with wrinkled brow, curly red hair, wearing grey shirt; dark grey ground
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Seventh design in a set of twelve. Based on Morita Kan'ya XIII (1885-1932) as Jean Valjean in the play Les Misérables 哀史, performed at the Yūraku Theater, December 1920.
title: The Actor Morita Kan'ya XIII as Jean Valjean
